parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the payment (MAX 64 ; MIN 36).

parameters.name: transaction_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the transaction.

reason.description: Indicating the reason for the refund. If set, possible values are `DUPLICATE`, `FRAUDULENT`, and `REQUESTED_BY_CUSTOMER`.

merchant_reference.description: Identification of the payment transaction defined by the merchant (MAX 255; MIN 3).

amount.description: Specifies the amount object for refund. **Only required for partial refunds**.

currency.description: The currency used to make the payment (MAX 3; MIN 3; [ISO 4217](country-reference)).

simplified_mode.description: Determines whether Yuno should automatically attempt to refund a payment after an initial error or decline. When set to `true`, Yuno will retry the refund process if the first attempt fails. By default, this is set to `false`. Access [Transaction Retries](doc:transaction-retries) for more details.

response_additional_data.description: Specifies additional data for required the transaction response

receipt.description: Indicates if a receipt is necessary for the transaction response

receipt_language.description: Indicates the language of the receipt to be generated

gender.description:
The customer's gender (MAX 1; MIN 1).
- M=Male
- F=Female
- NB=Non Binary
- NA=Not applicable
- NK=Not Known
- U=Undefined.

date_of_birth.description: The customer's date of birth in the `YYYY-MM-DD` format (Length: 10).

document.description: Specifies the customer's document object, including its number and type.

document_type.description: The customer's document type (MAX 6, MIN 2). Access [Document Type List](ref:customer-object#document-type-list) for more details.

country_code.description: The country code of the customer's phone (MAX 3; MIN 2).

number.description: The customer's phone number, without the country code (MAX 32; MIN 1).

billing_address.description: Specifies the customer's billing address object.

address_line_1.description: The primary billing address line of the customer (MAX 255; MIN 3).

address_line_2.description: The secondary billing address line of the customer (MAX 255; MIN 3).

city.description: The city considered for the billing address (MAX 255; MIN 3).

country.description: The country considered for the billing address (MAX 2; MIN 2; [ISO 3166-1](https://docs.y.uno/reference/customer-object#country-code-list-iso-3166-1)).

state.description: The state considered for the billing address (MAX 255; MIN 3).

zip_code.description: The zipcode considered for the billing address (MAX 11; MIN 4).

shipping_address.description: Specifies the customer's shipping address object.

address_line_1.description: The primary shipping address line of the customer (MAX 255; MIN 3).

address_line_2.description: The secondary shipping address line of the customer (MAX 255; MIN 3).

city.description: The city considered for the shipping address (MAX 255; MIN 3).

country.description: The country considered for the shipping address (MAX 2; MIN 2; [ISO 3166-1](https://docs.y.uno/reference/customer-object#country-code-list-iso-3166-1)).

state.description: The state considered for the shipping address (MAX 255; MIN 3).

zip_code.description: The zipcode considered for the shipping address (MAX 11; MIN 4).

items.example: The merchant has no authorization to use this API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the payment (MAX 64 ; MIN 36).

description.description: Description of the cancellation or refund. (MAX 255; MIN 3).

reason.description: Indicating the reason for the cancellation or refund. If set, possible values are `DUPLICATE`, `FRAUDULENT`, and `REQUESTED_BY_CUSTOMER`.

merchant_reference.description: Identification of the payment transaction defined by the merchant. If no merchant_reference is defined, the merchant_order_id of the payment will be associated to the transaction. (MAX 255; MIN 3).

amount.description: Specifies the amount object for refund.

currency.description: The currency used to make the payment (MAX 3; MIN 3; [ISO 4217](country-reference)).

simplified_mode.description: Indicates if we should try to refund a payment after an error/declined on the first try. It is `false` by default. For more information, access the [guide](transaction-retries).

response_additional_data.description: Specifies additional data for required the transaction response

receipt.description: Indicates if a receipt is necessary for the transaction response

receipt_language.description: Indicates the language of the receipt to be generated

gender.description:
The customer's gender (MAX 1; MIN 1).
- M=Male
- F=Female
- NB=Non Binary
- NA=Not applicable
- NK=Not Known
- U=Undefined.

date_of_birth.description: The customer's date of birth in the `YYYY-MM-DD` format (Length: 10).

document.description: Specifies the customer's document object, including its number and type.

document_type.description: The customer's document type (MAX 6, MIN 2). Access [Document Type List](ref:customer-object#document-type-list) for more details.

country_code.description: The country code of the customer's phone (MAX 3; MIN 2).

number.description: The customer's phone number, without the country code (MAX 32; MIN 1).

billing_address.description: Specifies the customer's billing address object.

address_line_1.description: The primary billing address line of the customer (MAX 255; MIN 3).

address_line_2.description: The secondary billing address line of the customer (MAX 255; MIN 3).

city.description: The city considered for the billing address (MAX 255; MIN 3).

country.description: The country considered for the billing address (MAX 2; MIN 2; [ISO 3166-1](https://docs.y.uno/reference/customer-object#country-code-list-iso-3166-1)).

state.description: The state considered for the billing address (MAX 255; MIN 3).

zip_code.description: The zipcode considered for the billing address (MAX 11; MIN 4).

shipping_address.description: Specifies the customer's shipping address object.

address_line_1.description: The primary shipping address line of the customer (MAX 255; MIN 3).

address_line_2.description: The secondary shipping address line of the customer (MAX 255; MIN 3).

city.description: The city considered for the shipping address (MAX 255; MIN 3).

country.description: The country considered for the shipping address (MAX 2; MIN 2; [ISO 3166-1](https://docs.y.uno/reference/customer-object#country-code-list-iso-3166-1)).

state.description: The state considered for the shipping address (MAX 255; MIN 3).

zip_code.description: The zipcode considered for the shipping address (MAX 11; MIN 4).

items.example: The merchant has no authorization to use this API.

post.summary: Cancel or Refund a Payment with transaction

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the payment (MAX 64 ; MIN 36).

parameters.name: transaction_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the transaction.

description.description: Description of the cancellation or refund. (MAX 255; MIN 3).

reason.description: Indicating the reason for the cancellation or refund. If set, possible values are `DUPLICATE`, `FRAUDULENT`, and `REQUESTED_BY_CUSTOMER`.

merchant_reference.description: Identification of the payment transaction defined by the merchant. If no merchant_reference is defined, the merchant_order_id of the payment will be associated to the transaction. (MAX 255; MIN 3).

amount.description: Specifies the amount object for refund.

currency.description: The currency used to make the payment (MAX 3; MIN 3; [ISO 4217](country-reference)).

simplified_mode.description: Indicates if we should try to refund a payment after an error/declined on the first try. It is `false` by default. For more information, access the [guide](transaction-retries).

response_additional_data.description: Specifies additional data for required the transaction response

receipt.description: Indicates if a receipt is necessary for the transaction response

receipt_language.description: Indicates the language of the receipt to be generated

gender.description:
The customer's gender (MAX 1; MIN 1).
- M=Male
- F=Female
- NB=Non Binary
- NA=Not applicable
- NK=Not Known
- U=Undefined.

date_of_birth.description: The customer's date of birth in the `YYYY-MM-DD` format (Length: 10).

document.description: Specifies the customer's document object, including its number and type.

document_type.description: The customer's document type (MAX 6, MIN 2). Access [Document Type List](ref:customer-object#document-type-list) for more details.

country_code.description: The country code of the customer's phone (MAX 3; MIN 2).

number.description: The customer's phone number, without the country code (MAX 32; MIN 1).

billing_address.description: Specifies the customer's billing address object.

address_line_1.description: The primary billing address line of the customer (MAX 255; MIN 3).

address_line_2.description: The secondary billing address line of the customer (MAX 255; MIN 3).

city.description: The city considered for the billing address (MAX 255; MIN 3).

country.description: The country considered for the billing address (MAX 2; MIN 2; [ISO 3166-1](https://docs.y.uno/reference/customer-object#country-code-list-iso-3166-1)).

state.description: The state considered for the billing address (MAX 255; MIN 3).

zip_code.description: The zipcode considered for the billing address (MAX 11; MIN 4).

shipping_address.description: Specifies the customer's shipping address object.

address_line_1.description: The primary shipping address line of the customer (MAX 255; MIN 3).

address_line_2.description: The secondary shipping address line of the customer (MAX 255; MIN 3).

city.description: The city considered for the shipping address (MAX 255; MIN 3).

country.description: The country considered for the shipping address (MAX 2; MIN 2; [ISO 3166-1](https://docs.y.uno/reference/customer-object#country-code-list-iso-3166-1)).

state.description: The state considered for the shipping address (MAX 255; MIN 3).

zip_code.description: The zipcode considered for the shipping address (MAX 11; MIN 4).

response_additional_data.description: Specifies additional data for required the transaction response

receipt_language.description: Indicates the language of the receipt to be generated

items.example: The merchant has no authorization to use this API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the payment (MAX 64 ; MIN 36).

parameters.name: transaction_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the transaction (MAX 64 ; MIN 36)

merchant_reference.description: Identification of the payment transaction defined by the merchant (MAX 255; MIN 3)

amount.description: Specifies the amount object for capturing.

currency.description: The currency used to make the payment (MAX 3; MIN 3; [ISO 4217](country-reference)).

reason.description: Indicating the reason for the capture. For example: PRODUCT_CONFIRMED and REQUESTED_BY_CUSTOMER.

additional_data.description: Additional data to complement the payment capture

shipping_amount.description: The shipping amount of the order (multiple of 0.0001)

fee_amount.description: The fee amount of the order (multiple of 0.0001)

items.description: Specifies the items array of object.

id.description: The unique identifier of the item (MAX 255; MIN 3).

name.description: The name of the item (MAX 255; MIN 3).

unit_amount.description: The unit amount of the item (multiple of 0.0001).

category.description: The category of the item. Check the [Item category reference](items-category-list).

brand.description: The brand of the item (MAX 255; MIN 3).

sku_code.description: The stock keeping unit (SKU) of the item (MAX 255; MIN 3).

manufacture_part_number.description: The manufacture part number of the item

legs.description: Specifies the legs array of objects.

departure_datetime.description: The departure date and time in UTC time ([ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601), MAX 27; MIN 27).

arrival_airport.description: IATA airport code. See http://www.iata.org (MAX 3; MIN 3).

carrier_code.description: IATA carrier code. See http://www.iata.org (MAX 2; MIN 2).

flight_number.description: The flight number assigned by the airline carrier (MAX 5; MIN 1).

fare_basis_code.description: Code base rate provides specific information on the fare in addition to the class service, both required for booking (MAX 15; MIN 1).

fare_class_code.description: The fare class code of the airline (MAX 1; MIN 1). The values can be a letter (A-Z) but may vary depending on the airline's definition. Check the [Airline information reference](airline-information#fare-class-code).

base_fare.description: The transaction amount, excluding taxes and fees, the smallest unit of currency (multipleOf 0.0001).

base_fare_currency.description: The currency used to transaction amount (MAX 3; MIN 3; [ISO 4217](country-reference)).

stopover_code.description: 1-letter code that indicates whether the passenger is allowed to make a stopover. Only two types of characters are allowed: O: Stopover allowed (the letter O, not zero) / X: Stopover not allowed. (MAX 1; MIN 1)

passengers.description: Specifies the passengers array of objects associated to the tickets.

type.description: The passenger type (MAX 1; MIN 1). Check the [Airline information reference](airline-information#passenger-type).

date_of_birth.description: The passenger date of birth in the YYYY-MM-DD (MAX 10; MIN 10).

document_type.description: The passenger's document type (MAX 6, MIN 2; ([Country reference](country-reference))).

country.description: Country where the document was issued (MAX 2; MIN 2; [ISO 3166-1](country-reference)).

loyalty_tier.description: Tier of passenger loyalty program. Check the [Airline information reference](airline-information#loyalty-tier).

phone.description: Specifies the phone object for the passenger.

tickets.description: Specifies the array of ticket objects associated to the passengers.

restricted.description: Indicates if the ticket is refunfable or not (true/false)

total_fare_amount.description: Total fare amount in the smallest unit of currency (multiple of 0.0001).

total_tax_amount.description: Total taxes amount in the smallest unit of currency (multiple of 0.0001).

total_fee_amount.description: Total fee amount in the smallest unit of currency (multiple of 0.0001).

carrier_prefix_code.description: Issuing or Validating carrier. This is the AWB Prefix (Air waybill) 3-numeric code (MAX 3; MIN 3).

travel_agent_code.description: Code of the travel agent issuing the ticket (MAX 9; MIN 8).

travel_agent_name.description: The name under which the point of sale appears on the agency list or franchise name (MAX 32; MIN 1).

address.description: Address of the agent whose sold the ticket (MAX 255; MIN 3).

city.description: City name of the agent whose sold the ticket (MAX 255; MIN 3).

country.description: Country code alpha 2 where the ticket was issued (MAX 2; MIN 2; [ISO 3166-1](country-reference)).

industry.description: The seller's industry (MAX 235; MIN 1) For more information access the [Industry category reference page](industry-category-list).

merchant_category_code.description: MCC - The merchant category code (MAX 235; MIN 1).

document.description: Specifies the document object of the seller.

document_type.description: The seller's document type (MAX 6, MIN 2; [Document Type List](ref:country-reference)).

phone.description: Specifies the seller's phone number object.

country_code.description: The country calling code of the seller's phone (MAX 3; MIN 1). Check the [Country reference](country-reference) to see the phone codes.

number.description: The seller's phone number, without the country code (MAX 32; MIN 1).

address_line_1.description: The primary address line of the seller (MAX 255; MIN 3).

address_line_2.description: The secondary billing address line of the seller (MAX 255; MIN 3).

city.description: The city considered for the seller's address (MAX 255; MIN 3).

country.description: The country considered for the seller's address (MAX 2; MIN 2; [ISO 3166-1](ref:country-reference)).

state.description: The state considered for the seller's address (MAX 255; MIN 3).

zip_code.description: The zipcode considered for the seller's address (MAX 11; MIN 4).

simplified_mode.description: Determines whether Yuno should automatically attempt to refund a payment after an initial error or decline. When set to `true`, Yuno will retry the refund process if the first attempt fails. By default, this is set to `false`. Access [Transaction Retries](doc:transaction-retries) for more details.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the payment (MAX 64 ; MIN 36).

parameters.name: transaction_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the transaction (MAX 64 ; MIN 36)

account_id.description: The unique identifier of the account (MAX 64; MIN 36).

file_name.description: The name of the documentation sent  (MAX 255; MIN 3).

content_type.description: The type of the documentation sent by the merchant

content_category.description: The category of the documentation sent by the merchant

content.description: The content of the documentation sent by the merchant  encoded in base64. Max size: 1MB.
